languages.text: {n}Обжигающий холод вмиг стискивает ваши легкие — так, что не сделать и вздоха. Кровь пульсирует в висках, а сердце заходится, выбивая безобразный ритм по ребрам. Это длится считанные секунды, однако вам кажется, что проходит вечность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Обжигающий холод вмиг стискивает ваши легкие — так, что не сделать и вздоха. Кровь пульсирует в висках, а сердце заходится, выбивая безобразный ритм по ребрам. Это длится считанные секунды, однако вам кажется, что проходит вечность.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обжигающий холод вмиг стискивает ваши легкие — так, что не сделать и вздоха. Кровь пульсирует в висках, а сердце заходится, выбивая безобразный ритм по ребрам. Это длится считанные секунды, однако вам кажется, что проходит вечность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A biting cold immediately clutches your lungs, not even allowing you to draw breath. Blood pluses in your temples, and the heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but they feel like an eternity.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A biting cold immediately clutches your lungs, not even allowing you to draw breath. Blood pluses in your temples, and the heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but they feel like an eternity.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pluses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pluses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}刺骨的寒冷瞬间攫住了你的肺部，你感觉仿佛无法呼吸。鲜血在你的太阳穴中跳动，你的心脏震颤着，仿佛是某个丑陋的刺青在肋骨之间跃动。这种感觉只持续了几秒钟，但就好像永无止境一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}刺骨的的寒冷瞬间攫住了你的肺部，你感觉仿佛无法呼吸。鲜血在你的太阳穴中跳动，你的心脏震颤着，仿佛是某个丑陋的刺青在肋骨之间跃动。这种感觉只持续了几秒钟，但就好像永无止境一般。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un frío penetrante inunda tus pulmones, impidiéndote respirar. La sangre retumba en tus sienes y tu corazón se desboca, tatuando tus costillas con su latir. Aunque solo pasan unos segundos, podría haber sido una eternidad por lo que a ti respecta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un frío penetrante inunda tus pulmones, impidiéndote respirar. La sangre retumba en tus sienes y tu corazón se desboca, tatuando tus costillas con su latir. Aunque solo pasan unos segundos, podría haber sido una eternidad por lo que a ti respecta.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}身を切るような寒さが一瞬にして肺を襲い、息をすることさえできなくなる。こめかみに血が流れ、心臓がバクバクと肋骨に醜い刺青を打つ。それはほんの数秒のことだが、永遠のように感じられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}身を切るような寒さが一瞬にして肺を襲い、息をすることさえできなくなる。こめかみに血が流れ、心臓がバクバクと肋骨に醜い刺青を打つ。それはほんの数秒のことだが、永遠のように感じられた。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Eine beißende Kälte ergreift augenblicklich deine Lungen und hindert dich daran, den kleinsten Atemzug zu tun. Blut pulsiert in deinen Schläfen, und dein Herz zittert und schlägt einen hässlichen Rhythmus gegen deine Rippen. Es dauert nur wenige Sekunden, doch es fühlt sich an wie eine Ewigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine beißende Kälte ergreift augenblicklich deine Lungen und hindert dich daran, den kleinsten Atemzug zu tun. Blut pulsiert in deinen Schläfen, und dein Herz zittert und schlägt einen hässlichen Rhythmus gegen deine Rippen. Es dauert nur wenige Sekunden, doch es fühlt sich an wie eine Ewigkeit.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un froid glacial s'empare de vos poumons au point de vous couper la respiration. Vous sentez le sang battre dans vos tempes et votre cœur s'emballer. La sensation de malaise s'estompe au bout de quelques secondes qui vous semblent pourtant durer une éternité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un froid glacial s'empare de vos poumons au point de vous couper la respiration. Vous sentez le sang battre dans vos tempes et votre cœur s'emballer. La sensation de malaise s'estompe au bout de quelques secondes qui vous semblent pourtant durer une éternité.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bir anda ciğerlerine acı bir soğuk dolup nefes almana bile engel oluyor. Şakaklarındaki nabız hızlanıyor; kalbin, kanatlanıp göğsünden fırlayacakmışçasına atıyor. Bu durum sadece birkaç saniye sürse de zaman geçmek bilmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A biting cold instantly grips your lungs, stopping you from even drawing a breath. Blood pulses in your temples, and your heart flutters, beating an ugly tattoo against your ribs. It lasts just a few seconds, but it feels like an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir anda ciğerlerine acı bir soğuk doluyor ve nefes almana bile engel oluyor. Şakaklarındaki nabız hızlanıyor; kalbin, kanatlanıp göğsünden fırlayacakmışçasına atıyor. Sadece birkaç saniye sürse de zaman geçmek bilmiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
